source_objects.title: Microsoft
source_objects.description: Become proficient in Microsoft tools: Windows, Sharepoint, Excel, Word, Powerpoint, Outlook, OneNote, Publisher, Project and more.

items.title: Learn Excel - The Excel Tutorial for Beginners
items.headline: Excel training covering Microsoft Excel basics, Excel formulas, Excel functions, formatting, graphics, & layout
objectives_summary: Learn how to navigate around Excel
Learn how to enter and edit data in Excel
Learn how to adjust the way data and information are displayed in Excel

items.title: Become an Excel VBA Expert for Beginners
items.headline: Learn Step by Step Excel with Macros and VBA Code with Practical Exercises.
objectives_summary: Understand automotive ways to use excel.
Undersand VBA and use Excel better
Use of excel in a powerful way.

items.title: Microsoft Excel - VBA

visible_instructors.title: eLearnExcel
visible_instructors.name: eLearnExcel
visible_instructors.job_title: Leading provider of Online Excel training

items.headline: Extend your knowledge of recorded macros using Excel VBA. Learn about Forms, Loops, Defined Functions and Automation
objectives_summary: If you are performing repeated actions on workbooks or sheets, it may be possible to automate that work. Importing data, cleaning that data, archiving existing information and similar activities are good candidates for automation in Excel. VBA provides extra options for developers looking to automate Excel.

items.title: Mastering Excel Dashboard Creation and Data Visualizations

visible_instructors.title: Paula Guilfoyle CPA & MVP
visible_instructors.job_title: Microsoft MVP, CPA Accountant, & Life Long Learner
visible_instructors.name: Paula

items.headline: Learn to create stunning visually effective dashboards that aid quick business decisions, track KPIs and reveal insights
objectives_summary: Learn the When, Why and how to use Excel Standard Charts
Learn to create eye catching dynamic non standard Excel Charts
Learn to create interactive dashboards with no coding or VBA

items.title: Microsoft Word 2013 Tutorial, Learn To Master Microsoft Word
items.headline: Learn to master Microsoft Word. A hands-on tutorial that teaches practical skills. Taught by leading Microsoft trainer
objectives_summary: Learn How To Become A Power User With Microsoft Word
A Practical Based Course That Uses Hands-On Examples To Teach
Learn The Skills Required To Use Microsoft Word In A Commercial Environment

items.title: PowerPoint - Impactful Microsoft PowerPoint Presentations
items.headline: Engage Your Audience by Creating and Presenting Impactful PowerPoint Presentations
objectives_summary: You will learn how to make design decisions that will enforce the presentations message rather than detract
You will learn to choose appropriate PowerPoint tools to enhance your presentation
You will learn what it takes to create PowerPoint presentations that keep the audience engaged

items.title: Best Excel Course: Data Cleaning - For further Data Analysis

visible_instructors.title: Yoda Learning
visible_instructors.job_title: Data Analyst |MS Office Expert & PMP | Instructor/Programmer
visible_instructors.name: Yoda

items.headline: Learn Advanced Excel tricks on Data Cleaning Analytic - Go To, Date Correction, Replace using Wildcards, Text to Columns
objectives_summary: Learn Beginner to Advanced tricks on Go To Special, Sanitizing, Find & Replace, Text to Column and Text Formulas
Get Downloadable Case Studies + Picture based eBook [mapped to the Lectures]
Get Course Completion Certificate

items.title: SQL for Microsoft Access

visible_instructors.title: Phillip Burton
visible_instructors.name: Phillip
visible_instructors.job_title: Best Selling Instructor - over 350,000 students so far

items.headline: Learn how to write SQL code in Microsoft Access, so you can create more advanced Access queries
objectives_summary: Know all 6 clauses of the SELECT statement, and in which order.
Add functions and formulas into your code.
Do basic and advanced JOINs, some of which cannot be done in the graphical interface.

items.title: Excel Advanced Dashboard Infographics MasterClass Volume  2

visible_instructors.title: Suhas Dakhole
visible_instructors.name: Suhas
visible_instructors.job_title: Computer Engineer, SSMBB, PRINCE2, SAP CRM, Lean Expert

items.headline: Learn the Art of converting your Dashboards and Charts into Creative,Innovative and Professional Looking Infographics
objectives_summary: Taking this course will be the best decision you will make as you will not only take your MS Excel Skills to a different level but also you will be an expert in creating attention-grabbing MS Excel infographics that you can use in your next presentation, your website or your social media campaign or anywhere you want.

items.title: Microsoft Access VBA, Design and Advanced Methods Workshop 3
items.headline: Learn new secrets to creating awesome Microsoft Access databases and VBA coding not covered in any of my other courses!
objectives_summary: Perform several advanced Microsoft Access techniques that will enable them to create more robust database systems
Use the SendKeys function and manipulate selection size with SelStart and SelLength
Create and run a StopWatch program to calculate elapsed time.

items.title: Excel 2010 Advanced
items.headline: Take Excel to the next level with PivotTables, Goal Seeking, Scenario Manager and much more
objectives_summary: Use several different types of advanced functions
See the benefits of conditional formatting
Use Excel as a simple database

items.title: MS PowerPoint For Beginners: Fast Track Training
items.headline: Learn how to master MS PowerPoint methods quickly and easily for yourself or business
objectives_summary: How To Easily Master MS PowerPoint For Beginners
How To Optimize MS PowerPoint For Best Results
Brand New Over-The-Shoulder Video Series For MS PowerPoint

items.title: Microsoft Excel Dashboards & Data Visualization Mastery
items.headline: The only Microsoft Excel Dashboard, Data Visualization & Data Analysis course for INTERMEDIATE to ADVANCED EXCEL users!
objectives_summary: Students will learn ADVANCED skills to create Dashboards and data visualizations in Excel
Students will become EXPERTS at creating INTERACTIVE ANALYSIS
Students will be able to QUICKLY CREATE Dashboards, Reports, and Interactive Applications (WITHOUT macros)

items.title: Excel 2013 PowerPivot & Advanced Business Intelligence Tools

items.headline: Enter the very hot world of BI, Power Pivot, DAX, and big data. This investment of your time is a no brainer.
objectives_summary: Import external data for analysis in PowerPivot

items.title: Microsoft Access VBA, Design and Advanced Methods Workshop 4
items.headline: Learn new secrets to creating awesome Microsoft Access databases and VBA coding not covered in any of my other courses!
objectives_summary: Perform several advanced Microsoft Access techniques that will enable them to create more robust database systems
